description:
Stop living paycheck to paycheck, get out of debt, and save money faster with YNAB.
		This software requires a license key which cannot be purchased anymore since YNAB has been transferred to a cloud solution.
		Keys that have been purchased before this transition can still be used.
		There is a trial period of 34 days available.
summary: Stop living paycheck to paycheck, get out of debt, and save money faster with YNAB.
author: You Need A Budget
